summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer, , and Audio/Video Capture in Media Foundation. Those features have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer, IMFMediaEngine and Audio/Video Capture in Media Foundation instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
The DVD_KaraokeAttributes structure contains information about a karaoke audio stream. The method fills in a DVD_KaraokeAttributes structure for a specified stream.

member.name: DVD_KaraokeAttributes.bVersion
member.summary: Version number. The current karaoke version is 1.0.

member.name: DVD_KaraokeAttributes.fMasterOfCeremoniesInGuideVocal1
member.summary: If TRUE, the "Guide Vocal 1" channel contains the "Master of Ceremonies" content.

member.name: DVD_KaraokeAttributes.fDuet
member.summary: A Boolean value indicating whether the song is intended to be sung as a duet.

member.name: DVD_KaraokeAttributes.ChannelAssignment
member.summary: A value indicating the speaker configuration into which all the channels will be mixed.

member.name: DVD_KaraokeAttributes.wChannelContents
member.summary: An array of valid values that identifies the content on each channel.
